attributes.action: Return wrongfully taken children to there parents
attributes.additional_details: Social services are taking so many children in to care that shouldn’t be in care they can’t take children for not going to school everyday and they can’t predict the future so they should not be able to use future harm. They are breaking up so many good family’s and homes it’s unreal. And just because social services weren’t there for some children doesn’t mean they can target families for children just so they hit the figures that you give them
attributes.background: Stop social services taking children from good homes and return the children that have wrongfully been put in the care system to their biological families. Also stop them using future harm as a reason to take children as no one can tell the future.I also believe the age to leave care should be lower

rejection.details:
There are already rules in place to ensure that children are only taken into care if a court believes a child is suffering or at risk of suffering significant harm.

If you are unhappy with the approach by your local child social services team, you can complain about this. You might find the Local Government and Social Care Ombudsman’s guidance on complaining about child social services helpful: https://www.lgo.org.uk/make-a-complaint/fact-sheets/social-care/children-s-care-services

If a court has made decisions about the care of your child and you wish to challenge this, you should seek legal advice.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Reform Family Separation System: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319465

End Forced Adoption: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330451
